title: (x) help finding fonts - Bernhard Modern, Helvetica, Cursif {Oliver L, Florian}
content:
Hi.  
I have attached 2 photos, both of which have 2 fonts on them. I would love to know all 4 if anyone can help! Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 22.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017173323/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%2022_1.png) | 17.45 KB |
| [Picture 18.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017173323/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%2018_4.png) | 32.64 KB |
author: juliet331

comments.content:
No you haven't.

You have now, sorry.
haha! i just realized that... they're there now!

It's hard to say in this small size, but:  
therese aherne: Bernhard Modern  
PHOTOGRAPHY: Probably both Helvetica  
The script I don't know - sorry...  
oliver

‘Savady’ is a modified [Cursif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017173323/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=cursif&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=savady&nb_ppp=10&psize=l&classt=alpha), a font that is based on the French school script.
